email_chain.subject: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I hope you're doing well. We have the OCEAN MASTER available for your steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Busan. Vessel details: DWT 85000, LOA 220m. Freight rate is $45/MT on CIF terms. Laycan is 25-30 May. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $40/MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Thanks for your response. The best I can do is $42/MT. Demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

$42/MT is acceptable. Can we adjust the laycan to 27 May - 1 June? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 12000MT.

Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Yes, the cargo size is 12000MT. Laycan adjusted to 27 May - 1 June. Please confirm your acceptance, and I will send the recap.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Coils Shipment - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Confirmed. Please send the recap.

Best,
Daniel

email_chain.subject: Recap - Steel Coils Shipment - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Steel Coils
- Cargo Size: 12000MT
- Load Port: Rotterdam
- Discharge Port: Busan
- Freight Rate: $42/MT CIF
- Laycan: 27 May - 1 June
- Demurrage: $15,000 per day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Emily
